CustomField.description: US-0018872 Hypercare Coupon - Correct BCD File missing fields US-0007348 Coupon Correction for External ID (2020-04-02)
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(EBH_OracleID__c != NULL, ISO_Currency_Code__c != NULL),(TEXT(VALUE(EBH_OracleID__c) * 1000 + VALUE(ISO_Currency_Code__c))), NULL)
CustomField.label: BCD External Id
